title: American Football
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 231 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 530L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Q and X
description: The action-packed sport of American Football excites spectators around the globe. Students will be interested to learn about the sport's origin as well as how the game is played. Amazing photos and diagrams support the text.
